body_html: If you really intend to remove it, mind at least keeping some of the functions in there (like move them to contrib.layers or something)? I think images_to_sequence and sequence_to_images are pretty useful.
body_text: If you really intend to remove it, mind at least keeping some of the functions in there (like move them to contrib.layers or something)? I think images_to_sequence and sequence_to_images are pretty useful.
body: If you really intend to remove it, mind at least keeping some of the functions in there (like move them to contrib.layers or something)? I think `images_to_sequence` and `sequence_to_images` are pretty useful.
